#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

long long int k;
char l[1005],ans[1005];
void calculate();

int main()
{
	int t;

	cin >> t;

	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> l;
		cin >> k;

		calculate();

		if (ans[0] == '0')
		{
			cout << ans + 1 << endl;
		}
		else
		{
			cout << ans << endl;
		}
	}

	return 0;
}

void calculate()
{
	int i, j, l1, l2, c, temp;
	long long int k2;

	l1 = strlen(l);
	c = 0;
	ans[0] = '0';

	l2 = 0;
	k2 = k;
	while (k2)
	{
		k2 >>= 1;
		l2++;
	}

	//cout << l1 << " " << l2 << endl;

	j = l1 - 1;

	ans[max(l1, l2)+1] = '\0';

	for (i = max(l1,l2); i >= 0; i--,j--)
	{
		if (j >= 0 && k > 0)
		{
			temp = l[j] - '0' + (k & 1) + c;
			k >>= 1;
		}
		else if(k > 0 && j < 0)
		{
			temp = (k & 1) + c;
			k >>= 1;
		}
		else if (k <= 0 && j >= 0)
		{
			temp = l[j] - '0' + c;
		}
		else
		{
			temp = c;
		}

		//cout << "i=" << i << " " << temp << endl;

		if (temp == 0)
		{
			c = 0;
			ans[i] = '0';
		}
		else if (temp == 1)
		{
			c = 0;
			ans[i] = '1';
		}
		else if (temp == 2)
		{
			c = 1;
			ans[i] = '0';
		}
		else
		{
			c = 1;
			ans[i] = '1';
		}

	}

}
